page.title: 01NEW SCHOOL PREMISES
page.content: The opening day in the old school was on Monday,2nd,September,1878.The first two children in the admission book were the headmaster's children.Our last day in the old school was on Friday,22nd,March,1985. We had 3 extra days holiday.This gave the teachers time to sort moving everything across to the new school. The new school opened on Monday,15th, April,1985.The old school had wooden block floors.The new school has carpets on the floor.The old school was bigger than the new one.The ceilings in the old school were a lot higher than in the new school.The old school had oil fired central heating.The new school has gas fired central heating.The windows in the new school are a lot lower than in the old school.
